column4: So, I have a bit of an extremely annoying problem. if anyone could help i'd appreciate. This is probably a total newbie problem but I have downloaded adobe flash like 10000000 times and I have no clue how to upgrade the thing D:::::::::::::::::
and also, the plug-in doesn't even appear in my list of plug-ins for firefox
what i7c says, find flashplugin-installer in the software center or use sudo apt-get
